idea-plugin.name: Jasmine DDescriber
idea-plugin.description:
This is an idea plugin to quickly run jasmine unit tests and suites by switching between describe() / ddescribe() and it() / iit()

Just type shit+ctrl+D to launch a dialog the lets you choose which suite of unit test you want to flip.

Use the tool window to see the files that have a ddescribe() of an iit(). You can filter and clean all the tests and suites that have been marked.

I have tested it on Websotrm and Intellij.

Download the code at: https://github.com/andresdominguez/ddescriber
idea-plugin.change-notes:
